title: Colt
description: She protects the innocent. But what if I’m the one she should be hunting?Liv knows this life—she grew up in it.Her father was MC royalty, but now? She’s with the DEA, taking down criminals like me.We shouldn’t want the same thing.But we do—we both want the cartel gone.I’ll scratch her back, and she’ll scratch... mine.An uneasy alliance. A dangerous game.But the more we fight together, the harder it is to fight what’s between us.The way she looks at me—like she wants to hate me, but she can’t.The way I want her—like I’ll break every rule to make her mine.We’ll take down the cartel together.And when the dust settles?She’ll belong to me.Colt (The Black Hornets MC #4) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with forbidden love, high stakes, and an antihero who will risk everything to claim the woman he craves.
author: Savannah Rylan
